column2: that I was lucky enough to go with someone who has eaten there many times
column3: to the point that he didn't even look at the menu and proceeded to order a million things. He also wasn't exactly on a budget
column5: I was a very lucky girl! :) There is no way I can recall everything that we ate
column6: but I will do my best to highlight a few of my FAVORITES. First
column11: and tiny oranges. The flavors worked so well together
column12: and it was a really beautiful dish. Pretty spicy
column13: but cooled down with the oranges
column14: very bold flavor. So let's get onto the sushi!
